## Quaternion.FromArray() method

Creates a new quaternion from data stored into an array

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static FromArray(array: ArrayLike<number>, offset?: number): Quaternion;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>ArrayLike&lt;number&gt;</code> | defines the data source |
|  offset | <code>number</code> | defines the offset in the source array where the data starts |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Quaternion`

a new quaternion
